ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He truly was one of Our slaves who are muminun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Surely he was among Our faithful creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely he was one of Our truly believing servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He was one of Our believing servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He is indeed one of Our high ranking, firmly believing bondmen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, he [Nuh] was one of Our believing servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely he was of Our believing servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: he was among Our believing servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! he is one of Our believing slaves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: he was truly one of Our faithful servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily he was of Our bondmen believing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He is indeed one of Our faithful servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For he was one of our believing Servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, he [Nuh (Noah)] was one of Our believing slaves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: he was one of Our believing worshipers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He was one of Our believing servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:81] He was indeed one of Our faithful servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! he is one of Our believing slaves.
